name: Branching Out (Little Martian)
description:
Branching Out is a simple endless puzzle game where you a tree by growing trunks and branches! But be careful you don't run out of space. It was made in just a single day (using assets from kenney.nl) for part of Kenney Jam 2022!

Controls
  • The next five moves are shown at the top of the screen. Use these to plan out your tree structure.
  • Click to expand the tree. A white cursor highlights valid moves.
  • Chop down parts of the tree to make room for new growth.
Credits
  • Craig Smith (Idea and implementation)
  • Tomás Palazzi (Music)
